trans-unit.source: List of all installed services with information and status for each of them.
trans-unit.target: List of all installed services with information and status for each of them.

trans-unit.source: This report displays a list of installed services, with detailed information about each of them. The services are ordered by type, priority and quality. Unavailable services are highlighted with an error status.
trans-unit.target: This report displays a list of installed services, with detailed information about each of them. The services are ordered by type, priority and quality. Unavailable services are highlighted with an error status.

trans-unit.source: The "Externals" column shows which external programs a given service relies on. If such program is missing or not executable, the service will be unavailable. Search paths for executables are listed at the bottom of this report.
trans-unit.target: The "Externals" column shows which external programs a given service relies on. If such program is missing or not executable, the service will be unavailable. Search paths for executables are listed at the bottom of this report.

trans-unit.source: Configured search paths for external programs
trans-unit.target: Configured search paths for external programs
